abandonedHeadElementChild.description: Unexpected element after head. Expected the element before `</head>`

abruptClosingOfEmptyComment.description: Unexpected `>` or `->`. Expected `-->` to close comments

abruptDoctypePublicIdentifier.description: Unexpected `>`. Expected a closing `"` or `'` after the public identifier

abruptDoctypeSystemIdentifier.description: Unexpected `>`. Expected a closing `"` or `'` after the identifier identifier

absenceOfDigitsInNumericCharacterReferen.reason: Unexpected non-digit at start of numeric character reference
absenceOfDigitsInNumericCharacterReferen.description: Unexpected `%c`. Expected `[0-9]` for decimal references or `[0-9a-fA-F]` for hexadecimal references

cdataInHtmlContent.description: Unexpected `<![CDATA[` in HTML. Remove it, use a comment, or encode special characters instead

characterReferenceOutsideUnicodeRange.reason: Unexpected too big numeric character reference
characterReferenceOutsideUnicodeRange.description: Unexpectedly high character reference. Expected character references to be at most hexadecimal 10ffff (or decimal 1114111)

closingOfElementWithOpenChildElements.reason: Unexpected closing tag with open child elements
closingOfElementWithOpenChildElements.description: Unexpectedly closing tag. Expected other tags to be closed first

controlCharacterInInputStream.description: Unexpected control character `%x`. Expected a non-control code point, 0x00, or ASCII whitespace

controlCharacterReference.description: Unexpectedly control character in reference. Expected a non-control code point, 0x00, or ASCII whitespace

disallowedContentInNoscriptInHead.description: Unexpected text character `%c`. Only use text in `<noscript>`s in `<body>`

duplicateAttribute.description: Unexpectedly double attribute. Expected attributes to occur only once

endTagWithTrailingSolidus.reason: Unexpected slash at end of closing tag

endTagWithoutMatchingOpenElement.description: Unexpected end tag. Expected no end tag or another end tag

eofBeforeTagName.description: Unexpected end of file. Expected tag name instead

eofInCdata.reason: Unexpected end of file in CDATA
eofInCdata.description: Unexpected end of file. Expected `]]>` to close the CDATA

eofInComment.reason: Unexpected end of file in comment
eofInComment.description: Unexpected end of file. Expected `-->` to close the comment

eofInDoctype.reason: Unexpected end of file in doctype
eofInDoctype.description: Unexpected end of file. Expected a valid doctype (such as `<!doctype html>`)

eofInElementThatCanContainOnlyText.reason: Unexpected end of file in element that can only contain text
eofInElementThatCanContainOnlyText.description: Unexpected end of file. Expected text or a closing tag

eofInScriptHtmlCommentLikeText.reason: Unexpected end of file in comment inside script
eofInScriptHtmlCommentLikeText.description: Unexpected end of file. Expected `-->` to close the comment

eofInTag.reason: Unexpected end of file in tag
eofInTag.description: Unexpected end of file. Expected `>` to close the tag

incorrectlyClosedComment.description: Unexpected `%c-1`. Expected `-->` to close the comment

incorrectlyOpenedComment.description: Unexpected `%c`. Expected `<!--` to open the comment

invalidFirstCharacterOfTagName.reason: Invalid first character in tag name
invalidFirstCharacterOfTagName.description: Unexpected `%c`. Expected an ASCII letter instead

misplacedDoctype.description: Unexpected doctype. Expected doctype before head

misplacedStartTagForHeadElement.description: Unexpected start tag `<head>`. Expected `<head>` directly after doctype

missingAttributeValue.description: Unexpected `%c-1`. Expected an attribute value or no `%c-1` instead

missingDoctype.description: Expected a `<!doctype html>` before anything else

missingDoctypeName.description: Unexpected doctype end at `%c`. Expected `html` instead

missingEndTagName.description: Unexpected `%c`. Expected an ASCII letter instead

missingQuoteBeforeDoctypePublicIdentifie.reason: Missing quote before public identifier in doctype

missingQuoteBeforeDoctypeSystemIdentifie.reason: Missing quote before system identifier in doctype

missingWhitespaceAfterDoctypePublicKeywo.reason: Missing whitespace after public identifier in doctype

missingWhitespaceAfterDoctypeSystemKeywo.reason: Missing whitespace after system identifier in doctype

missingWhitespaceBetweenDoctypePublicAnd.reason: Missing whitespace between public and system identifiers in doctype

nestedNoscriptInHead.description: Unexpected `<noscript>`. Expected a closing tag or a meta element

nonVoidHtmlElementStartTagWithTrailingSo.reason: Unexpected trailing slash on start tag of non-void element

noncharacterCharacterReference.reason: Unexpected noncharacter code point referenced by character reference
noncharacterCharacterReference.description: Unexpected code point. Do not use noncharacters in HTML

noncharacterInInputStream.description: Unexpected code point `%x`. Do not use noncharacters in HTML

nullCharacterReference.reason: Unexpected NULL character referenced by character reference
nullCharacterReference.description: Unexpected code point. Do not use NULL characters in HTML

openElementsLeftAfterEof.description: Unexpected end of file. Expected closing tag instead

surrogateCharacterReference.reason: Unexpected surrogate character referenced by character reference
surrogateCharacterReference.description: Unexpected code point. Do not use lone surrogate characters in HTML

surrogateInInputStream.description: Unexpected code point `%x`. Do not use lone surrogate characters in HTML

unexpectedCharacterAfterDoctypeSystemIde.reason: Invalid character after system identifier in doctype

unexpectedCharacterInAttributeName.description: Unexpected `%c`. Expected whitespace, `/`, `>`, `=`, or probably an ASCII letter

unexpectedCharacterInUnquotedAttributeVa.reason: Unexpected character in unquoted attribute value
unexpectedCharacterInUnquotedAttributeVa.description: Unexpected `%c`. Quote the attribute value to include it

unexpectedEqualsSignBeforeAttributeName.reason: Unexpected equals sign before attribute name
unexpectedEqualsSignBeforeAttributeName.description: Unexpected `%c`. Add an attribute name before it

unexpectedNullCharacter.description: Unexpected code point `%x`. Do not use NULL characters in HTML

unexpectedQuestionMarkInsteadOfTagName.reason: Unexpected question mark instead of tag name
unexpectedQuestionMarkInsteadOfTagName.description: Unexpected `%c`. Expected an ASCII letter instead

unexpectedSolidusInTag.description: Unexpected `%c-1`. Expected it followed by `>` or in a quoted attribute value

unknownNamedCharacterReference.description: Unexpected character reference. Expected known named character references
